params.title: Filename
params.caption: Base filename without extension (extension is added automatically based on output format).

params.title: Output format
params.caption: Select the file format for the exported data.
params.value: JSON [json], CSV [csv], HTML [html], XML [xml], Markdown [md], YAML [yaml], Plain Text [txt], Excel [xlsx], PDF [pdf], HL7 v2.x [hl7v2], HL7 FHIR [fhir]

params.title: File location
params.caption: Directory path where the file will be saved. Leave empty to use the job's temp directory.

params.title: Create folder
params.caption: Automatically create the output folder if it does not exist. If disabled, an error is thrown when the folder is missing.

params.title: Add timestamp
params.caption: Append a timestamp (YYYYMMDD_HHmmss) to the filename.

params.title: Add short UID
params.caption: Append an 8-character unique identifier to the filename.

params.title: Folder kleenup
params.caption: WARNING: 'DELETE' will permanently remove ALL files in the output folder before export! Use with extreme caution.
params.value: Keep existing files [keep], Move to OLD subfolder [archive], ⚠️ DELETE all files (DANGEROUS!) [delete]

params.title: Report title
params.caption: Custom title for HTML and Markdown reports. Leave empty to use the filename.

params.title: Data Transforms (YAML)
params.caption: Optional YAML configuration for data transformations. Transforms are applied in order (pipeline). 25 transforms available including filter, select, rename, sort, compute, group, mask, if, set, and more. See README for full documentation.
